group_1.textCenter: I wish the three of us could stay together@like we were when we set out!
If our ancestors could love all of the people,@both the good and the bad,
then, Shizuka, Sunao, I want to love you@no matter how you are!

group_1.narration: "When I first arrived at Tokime Village@and found out I was a descendant of the clan,@I didn't really know what I was doing,@and it was all thanks to you, Shizuka,@that I learned how to fight with pride as a Diviner!"

"And the reason we were able to stay together@was because of you, Sunao, because you were@able to so perfectly bring together those@who lived their whole lives in the mountains,@and those like me that came from the city!"
"If anyone was missing then we, the Tokime Clan,@wouldn't be able to stand on our own two feet.@It's only because we all support each other@that we can stand and fight."

group_1.textCenter: So please, Shizuka, come back to us!@We can all support each other!
You don't have to push into the far end of@good and evil, and make people suffer.
Let's start the Tokime Clan over again!

group_1.textLeft: At this point...it's already too late...

group_1.textRight: Hold up, this is no time to be@goofing around on your phone!
We still don't know what@Kanagi and Mitama did here...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, sorry. I was just trying to@get in touch with Chiharu,
to see if the Tokime Clan is doing alright...

group_1.textRight: Oh, uh, sorry. So that's what you were doing...
...You know, Shizuka kind of seemed like the old me.

group_1.textLeft: By old, you mean, like, when you were a kid?

group_1.textRight: I'm talking about when I fused@with the Chelation Land Rumor.
Back then I was trying to shoulder@everything by myself, remember?
Shizuka's the leader of the Tokime Clan,
and I think she's desperately trying@to lead the whole clan by herself,
and losing sight of the world@around her in the process.

group_1.textLeft: (If that's the case, then what Shizuka needs@is the hearts of her friends...)
(She needs the love of everyone that supports her...)

group_1.narration: As Miss Chiharu says, the Tokime Clan is@made up of both those who were isolated@from the world like Miss Shizuka, and those@who lived as part of the world like Miss Chiharu,@and that's why there is an insurmountable@gap between them.

Miss Shizuka and the branch families that@were raised apart from the world are@different from other Magical Girls.@They have dedicated their lives to the@Land of the Rising Sun, and they aren't@able to reject their current selves.
They are bound by a sense of duty to@protect the land that they've lived for.
But now,@I think they're trying to break free from that spell,
the spell that has bound them ever since@their wishes were taken from them.
If Miss Shizuka and the others can free@themselves from the history binding them,
I think that in itself would be a source of hope@for all of the Magical Girls that have been@ensnared by their fates.

group_1.textLeft: I have something that I want you to@tell Miss Chiharu and Miss Sunao...
Oh, I get it. Just like what happened@with Iroha and Kureha...

group_1.textRight: Yes, if we use the [textYellow:Kimochi] stones...

group_1.textLeft: Right, she might be able to@understand our thoughts.
